name: Golf Ace
description:
Are you ready for an amazing golf experience with up to 12 different players? Complete on the 5 courses that has 18 poles. By completing courses faster than your friends, leave your friends behind on leaderboard and win! More courses, ball customizations and level editor will be added at early access!

  • Simple gameplay!
  • Complete on the 5 courses that has 18 poles!
  • 12 Player Multiplayer Mode!
  • Different obstacles!

More courses, ball customizations and level editor will be added at early access!
